page.title: 13Services for the Handicapped
page.content: Day Centre at Rashs Green. This 100 place centre for mentally handicapped and autistic adults funded by Norfolk County Council provides social training and simple work experience including woodwork, printing, pottery and cookery. 10 places are for residents of the Autistic Hostel. Day Centre for Mentally Ill. This is run by the Dereham branch of MIND.Emphasis is placed on social interaction and re-introducing members to normal everyday activities. Gateway Club for the mentally handicapped is run by MENCAP one evening a week.Dereham Disabled Club. Meets weekly at the club premises in Wellington Road. Frequent outings and trips are organised for club members.
